COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN RELATIONS
February 23, 1967
Mr. Myron M. Curry, Director
KFJM and Closed Circuit TV and
Representative for Region IV
National Educational Radio
University of North Dakota â€¢
Grand Forks, North Dakota
Dear. Mr, Curry:
Thank you for your letter of February 18. I am pleased
that my legislative assistant, George Pavlik, was able to be
of some assistance to you, and I regret I was unable to meet
with you.
I appreciate having the information you submitted and
will follow the hearings closely.
Yours sincerely,
A
